metadata.description: Farewell dialogue templates with personality and formality variations
notes: Farewell templates are selected based on NPC personality and conversation outcome

friendly_casual.name: WarmGoodbye
friendly_casual.text: Take care! Come back and visit anytime!

friendly_casual.name: EnthusiasticSendOff
friendly_casual.text: Good luck on your adventures! May fortune smile upon you!

formal_polite.name: HumbleBid
formal_polite.text: May your journey be safe. Thank you for your time.

formal_polite.name: CourteousBow
formal_polite.text: Farewell, honored guest. May the gods watch over you.

hostile_gruff.name: SuspiciousWarning
hostile_gruff.text: Watch yourself out there. Don't trust anyone.

hostile_gruff.name: HostileThreat
hostile_gruff.text: Be gone. Don't make me say it twice.

weary_gloomy.name: WearyDismissal
weary_gloomy.text: Go on then. I have work to do.

weary_gloomy.name: MelancholicSigh
weary_gloomy.text: May you find what I could not... farewell.

arrogant_superior.name: ArrogantDismissal
arrogant_superior.text: Very well. You may leave now.

arrogant_superior.name: DisdainfulWave
arrogant_superior.text: Run along now. I have important matters to attend to.

shy_nervous.name: NervousWave
shy_nervous.text: Um... thanks for stopping by! *anxious smile*

mysterious_cryptic.name: CrypticFarewell
mysterious_cryptic.text: Our paths will cross again... when the time is right.

mysterious_cryptic.name: PropheticWarning
mysterious_cryptic.text: Go now. The shadows lengthen, and darkness approaches.

mysterious_cryptic.name: EnigmaticSmile
mysterious_cryptic.text: Until destiny calls us together once more...

quirky_unique.name: SingsFarewell
quirky_unique.text: Goodbye, farewell, until we meet again-well!

quirky_unique.name: RhymingGoodbye
quirky_unique.text: Off you go, may fortune flow!

quirky_unique.name: ThirdPersonBye
quirky_unique.text: Grog says goodbye! Grog hopes to see you again!

wise_sage.name: WiseBenediction
wise_sage.text: Go forth with wisdom, young one. May you find your truth.

wise_sage.name: PhilosophicalBlessing
wise_sage.text: Remember: the journey is the destination. Farewell.

merchant_salesman.name: SalesmanBye
merchant_salesman.text: Come again soon! Remember, best prices in town!

merchant_salesman.name: EagerReturn
merchant_salesman.text: Don't forget to tell your friends! Safe travels!

blessings_hopeful.name: HeartfeltBlessing
blessings_hopeful.text: May the road rise to meet you, friend.

blessings_hopeful.name: HopefulWish
blessings_hopeful.text: Go with hope in your heart. The world needs more heroes.
